additional_data.description: Daughter of Lü Bu, the most formidable and feared commander of China's Three Kingdoms period. She still sucks at acting, but her spirit essence is increasing more and more, even if that's not what she wants. Her poor performances at the end of battle are misconstrued as attempts to deceive her opponents, causing many to remark that she's not only strong but also smart. They may intend it as a compliment, but somehow she's never very happy to hear it.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 16/08/17 - 06/09/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 03/09/2017 - 06/09/2017
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the total Event Points gained by 33% during the "Ghost in the Mirror" event.
◦ The effect increases with the number of limit breaks. (33% → 49.75% → 66.5% → 83.25% → 100%)
◦ Summon rate increased until 16/08/17 - 30/08/17

main: "Ugh, why do I have to be so strong...?"
summon: "I've been getting stronger and stronger lately..."
